payload.name: backpressure
payload.title: Backpressure: the only honest overload strategy
payload.formal: when downstream cannot process, upstream must slow/stop; otherwise queues explode.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2 already implements backpressure in resource governance for pulse subscriptions and in budgets for sessions. Push it everywhere: tool execution pools, replication streams, CI import, gate evaluation. Also: treat “cannot accept work” as a normal outcome, not an error.
